Convert integer type data into binary, octal and hexadecimal
In this section, you will learn how to convert an integer type data into binary, octal and hexadecimal. The java.lang package provides the facility for converting the data integer into binary, octal, and hexadecimal. The following program helps you to convert into these. toBinaryString() method converts integer type data into binary, toHexString() method converts integer type into hexadecimal and toOctalString() method converts integer into octal type data.
